data.title: Snow Forecasts for 219 Swiss Ski Areas - 30 Aug 2024
data.meta_description: Short, Medium and Long-Range Snow Forecasts for 219 Ski Resorts in Switzerland at 30th August 2024. Snowfall and Weather for Swiss Ski Resorts.
data.text:
Switzerland Snow Forecasts and Reports for Swiss Ski Resorts

Where is there snow in Switzerland?

When will it next snow in Switzerland?

There is snow forecast to fall in Switzerland over the next week, in at least 50 Ski Resorts including Davos, Engelberg, Klosters, St. Moritz and Zermatt.

Forecast updated : 29 Aug 2024 19:01 PDT

How much snow is there in Switzerland?

The deepest reported snow in Switzerland is in Saas Fee, which reports snow depths of 110in on upper slopes.

Snow report updated : 29 Aug 2024 21:46 PDT

When did it last snow in Switzerland?

Recent snow reports indicate that it snowed in Switzerland on Thursday 4th July 2024, in Ski Resorts including Lötschental.

Snow report updated : 29 Aug 2024 21:46 PDT

Join J2Ski's Snow Mail

for Swiss snow reports by e-mail.

Swiss Ski Resorts - Forecast Snow Comparison

The latest snow forecasts for Ski Resorts in Switzerland - please note that all ski resorts can be affected by weather at short notice, and you should check with the Tourist Office before travelling.

Swiss Snow Forecasts Ski Resort Forecast 48 HrFriSatSunMonTueWedThu 7 DaySnow Conditions Adelboden--- Aletsch-2in Not Known Alpes Vaudoises--Not Known Andermatt--- Anzère--Not Known Avers / Cresta--- Bad Ragaz--Not Known Beatenberg--- Bergün / Bravuogn-4in - Bosco Gurin--Not Known Braunwald--Not Known Champex-Lac--Not Known Champoussin--Not Known Champéry--Not Known Château d'Oex--- Corvatsch-Diavolezza-Lagalb-10in - Crans-Montana--hard powder Davos--Not Known Engelberg-5in Not Known Flims-- - Four Valleys-2in Not Known Frutigen-1in Not Known Grimentz--- Grindelwald--- Gstaad-1in Not Known Heiden--- Interlaken-2in - Kandersteg--- Klosters-1in Not Known Laax--- Lenzerheide - Valbella--Not Known Les Crosets--Not Known Leukerbad--- Lungern / Schönbüel--- Moléson--Not Known Monte Tamaro / Rivera--- Montreux--- Morgins--Not Known Nara--- Nendaz--Not Known Obersaxen--Not Known Ovronnaz--Not Known Portes du Soleil--Ski Area Open Saas-Fee-1in - Samedan--Not Known St. Moritz--Not Known Thyon les Collons--Not Known Tschappina Heinzenberg--- Täsch--- Unterwasser--Not Known Verbier--Not Known Veysonnaz--Not Known Villars - Gryon--Not Known Waltensburg--- Wengen--- Wilderswil bei Interlaken--- Winterhorn--- Wirzweli--- Zermatt-21in Not Known

N.B. The above table shows only the top 60 Swiss ski resorts; please use the Map in the menu above or the links below to see regions of Switzerland.

The Swiss snow forecast figures given here are the likely average cumulative snowfall on each day, for the specified ski resort. Local snow depths may vary considerably from slope to slope.

Off Piste and Avalanche Safety

Ski Safe : If you intend to ski or snowboard out of bounds in Switzerland, you must check conditions locally before doing so. Always check the Avalanche Risk Level and carry appropriate avalanche safety equipment at all times.

Swiss Snow Forecast Table Key

Snow Forecast - links to 7-Day medium-range and 14-Day long-range Snow Forecasts.

48 Hours - total snowfall forecast in the next 48 hours.

7 Days - total snowfall possible over the next 7 days.

Status - ski area status (Open/Closed/Unknown).

Snow Conditions - current skiing conditions.

All Snow Forecasts beyond 2 days are subject to change. The multi-day snowfall totals above are the total quantity of fresh snow expected to fall, and do NOT account for settling and compaction that will occur.
